text: Square 2 is a vibrant neighborhood shopping mall which offer diverse experiences to its visitors. It has supermarke, beauty & wellness, pharmacy, fashion, play as well as choices of food and beverages. Square 2 has direct link to the Velocity @ Novena Square shopping mall, Oasia Hotel Novena, Tan Tock Seng Hospital as well as Novena station of MRT North South Line. It is a good place if you are looking for shopping and dining experience at one place
